item.title: Assignment of a Lifetime: Riding in a U-2 Spy Plane at the Edge of Space
item.description:
Assignment of a Lifetime: Riding in a U-2 Spy Plane at the Edge of Space

Back in 2010, San Francisco-based photographer Christopher Michel received a once-in-a-lifetime photo assignment from the US Navel Institute: to ride in the back seat of a U-2 spy plane at the "edge of space." At the plane's cruising and intelligence-gathering altitude of 70,000 feet above the ground, temperatures outside the plane fall to 70 degrees below zero.

item.title: Travel Smarter: The Backpack That Doubles as a Mobile Office
item.description:
Travel Smarter: The Backpack That Doubles as a Mobile Office

Our pals at This is Ground recently launched a "smart" backpack that will make you feel like the coolest, most in-the-know traveler out there. Crossing town (or the globe) with a laptop, iPad, headphones, and WiFi port can weigh you down - but it's a reality for many, especially those who work from the road.

item.title: Bistro Proti Proudu, Prague, Czech Republic
item.description:
Bistro Proti Proudu, Prague, Czech Republic

With an ever-growing number of cool cafés, wine bars and shops, Prague's Karlín district is fast becoming a haven for the hip set. Its latest arrival, is Bistro Proti, a cosy corner eatery with a sleek interior inspired by the neighbourhood's most significant historical figure, engineer František Križík.

item.title: Space odyssey: photographer Thomas Ruff heads to the moon with new work.
item.description:
Space odyssey: photographer Thomas Ruff heads to the moon with new work.

The Düsseldorf photographer Thomas Ruff is having his day in the sun, with the Art Gallery of Ontario's 'Object Relations', a major solo show, opening this month. Closer to home, Chelsea's David Zwirner Gallery is celebrating Ruff's latest series of work.

item.title: Reduced Spoke Bicycles : Conceptual Bike
item.description:
Reduced Spoke Bicycles : Conceptual Bike

Conceptual Bike - Ion Lucin has simplified the design of a standard two-wheeler with his conceptual bike Baik that opts for three-spoked wheels, a limited use of lin...
